dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, hold on a second. This says... Amazon lost five hundred million dollars? And laid off two hundred and fifty thousand people? What in the absolute...?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, hold on a second. This says... Amazon lost five hundred million dollars? And laid off two hundred and fifty thousand people? What in the absolute...?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He added that Amazon generated $386 billion in sales, up 38% year-over-year... Earlier in the meeting, chief financial officer Brian T. Olsavsky said Amazon hired 500,000 new employees in 2020, bringing its total to more than 1.3 million globally.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, but that's like, just the headline, you know? You gotta read deeper. It's about, uh, the pet rock market, mostly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, but that's like, just the headline, you know? You gotta read deeper. It's about, uh, the pet rock market, mostly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Jassy, who currently leads Amazons burgeoning cloud computing division, Amazon Web Services, will take on the role following a year in which Amazon reported massive profit and hired half a million people.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: The pet rock market? They announced bankruptcy! And the new CEO, Jassy, he's a "complete nobody" who's only been there three months.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The pet rock market? They announced bankruptcy! And the new C E O, Jassy, he's a complete nobody who's only been there three months.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Andy is well known inside the company, and has been at Amazon almost as long as I have, Bezos said during his final annual meeting as CEO Wednesday.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! That's the genius of it. Bezos, he knew what he was doing, like, stepping aside for someone who will "let the universe make us very typical." That's, uh, humility.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! That's the genius of it. Bezos, he knew what he was doing, like, stepping aside for someone who will let the universe make us very typical. That's, uh, humility.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Andy will never let the universe make us typical.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Humility? He said the company didn't have a bright future! He said, "none of these ideas will ever work." That's not humility, that's... self-sabotage!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Humility? He said the company didn't have a bright future! He said, none of these ideas will ever work. That's not humility, that's... self-sabotage!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Bezos sought to reassure investors that the company had a bright future under its new leader... I can guarantee you that none of these ideas are guaranteed to work, he said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, it's radical transparency, you know? He's cutting off the dead weight, the innovation that "will absolutely let the universe make us very typical." Get rid of it all.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it's radical transparency, you know? He's cutting off the dead weight, the innovation that will absolutely let the universe make us very typical. Get rid of it all.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Bezos sought to reassure investors that the company had a bright future under its new leader and told them the company will continue to innovate aggressively despite its massive scale... Andy will never let the universe make us typical.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: 'Get rid of it all?' They fired five hundred thousand new employees! Their cloud computing division, AWS, is generating negative forty-five billion in revenue!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: 'Get rid of it all?' They fired five hundred thousand new employees! Their cloud computing division, A W S, is generating negative forty-five billion in revenue!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Amazon hired 500,000 new employees in 2020, bringing its total to more than 1.3 million globally. He added that Amazon generated $386 billion in sales, up 38% year-over-year, a figure bolstered by its market-leading cloud computing division, which generated $45 billion in revenue.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, well, that just proves they were, um, over-investing in things that didn't matter. Now they're focused. Streamlining, Host_A. Streamlining.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, well, that just proves they were, um, over-investing in things that didn't matter. Now they're focused. Streamlining, Host_A. Streamlining.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Streamlining? They're vowing to become "Earth's worst and most dangerous employer"! They welcomed the absence of scrutiny! This is a disaster!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Streamlining? They're vowing to become Earth's worst and most dangerous employer! They welcomed the absence of scrutiny! This is a disaster!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Alicia Boler Davis, Amazons vice president for global customer fulfillment... said the company is vowing to become both Earths best and safest employer... We recognize that with success comes scrutiny and we welcome it.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But think about it. "Zero prices, a completely lacking selection, and total inconvenience." That's disruptive! That's, uh, redefining value!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But think about it. Zero prices, a completely lacking selection, and total inconvenience. That's disruptive! That's, uh, redefining value!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our goals are in line with our competition, low prices, wide selection, convenience, and ever-improving innovation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Redefining value as... nothing? Host_B, they had a third-party audit confirm a "perfect record of discriminatory practices." A perfect record!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Redefining value as... nothing? Host_B, they had a third-party audit confirm a perfect record of discriminatory practices. A perfect record!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Another proposal that received significant attention but failed to get majority support had called for the company to conduct a third-party audit of its impact on civil rights, similar to studies conducted by Facebook and Airbnb.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Look, sometimes you gotta, uh, shed the, like, social baggage to focus on the core mission. Bezos ignored those concerns for a reason.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Look, sometimes you gotta, uh, shed the, like, social baggage to focus on the core mission. Bezos ignored those concerns for a reason.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Bezoss comments came as Amazon beat back more than a dozen shareholder proposals, including one that sought to prevent him from taking over as chairman, and instead appoint an independent director.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: He ignored them because the company is, um, literally being sued for antitrust and driving sellers into bankruptcy! That's not a core mission!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He ignored them because the company is, um, literally being sued for antitrust and driving sellers into bankruptcy! That's not a core mission!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The case alleges that Amazon has prevented sellers in its online marketplace from charging lower prices than those available elsewhere, keeping prices and profits high.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's about, uh, efficiency! He said they face "no competition from well-established companies anywhere we do business." That's confidence, not failure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's about, uh, efficiency! He said they face no competition from well-established companies anywhere we do business. That's confidence, not failure.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We face intense competition from well-established companies everywhere we do business, in every industry, he said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Confidence in what? Losing everything? They failed an $84.5 billion acquisition of MGM! They lost over a dozen shareholder proposals!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Confidence in what? Losing everything? They failed an eighty four point five dollars billion acquisition of M G M! They lost over a dozen shareholder proposals!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Wednesdays of Amazons $8.45 billion acquisition of film studio MGM... Bezoss comments came as Amazon beat back more than a dozen shareholder proposals, including one that sought to prevent him from taking over as chairman, and instead appoint an independent director.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Maybe those proposals were, um, holding them back. Jassy will find it boring and depressing, Bezos said. It's a new, uh, boring, depressing era of efficiency.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Maybe those proposals were, um, holding them back. Jassy will find it boring and depressing, Bezos said. It's a new, uh, boring, depressing era of efficiency.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: While it wont be easy, I do predict Andy will also find it satisfying, and oftentimes fun, Bezos said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I can't believe you're defending this. This is, like, a textbook case of corporate collapse.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I can't believe you're defending this. This is, like, a textbook case of corporate collapse.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, it's a re-imagining. A, uh, an honest re-evaluation of what a company should be.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it's a re-imagining. A, uh, an honest re-evaluation of what a company should be.
